document.full_text: a pilot who landed a small plane on a public beach in new york city and later bragged he was simulating action seen on an alaskan adventure tv show may lose his license, the faa said on wednesday.
document.title: pilot may lose license over landing plane on public beach
lines_and_colors: a pilot who landed a small plane on a public beach in new york city and later bragged he was simulating action seen on an alaskan adventure tv show may lose his license, the faa said on wednesday.
